entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
